body_html: I am having this literal exact problem, I am trying to retrain after multiple runs and I am running into this problem now. I have all of my folders named properly, no spaces or dashes, I am using only jpgs in the folders with no other files located in the sub folders. I am truly lost on how to get this error to go away as I have tried to edit nearly everything in the retrain.py code to get it running and to no avail, still receiving 'No valid folders of images found at'
